title: Senior Salesforce Consultant
description:
**About Us:** At Soros Consulting, we specialize in staffing and recruiting, driven by innovation and collaboration. Join us in shaping the future of our IT and Multimedia solutions.
  
**Job Summary:** We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Salesforce Consultant with profound expertise in the Salesforce platform, encompassing its products, functionalities, and adeptness in customizing Salesforce applications for both Android and iOS platforms.
  
The consultant will be tasked with orchestrating the design and successful deployment of Salesforce solutions for our organization. This role involves designing, configuring, and optimizing Salesforce solutions that seamlessly integrate Service Cloud, mobile app development, and AI capabilities. The consultant ensures our Salesforce implementations are robust, scalable, and error-free.
  
The consultant must possess expertise in no-code, low-code, and pro-code methodologies within the Salesforce ecosystem. The Consultant should demonstrate proficiency in developing maintainable and scalable Service Cloud solutions that align with business requirements. In this role, the consultant will lead the design, configuration, and implementation of Salesforce Service Cloud Voice with Amazon Connect capabilities, collaborating closely with internal stakeholders to craft optimal solutions and ensure deployment and integration of voice features. Expertise in Salesforce Service Cloud Voice with Amazon Connect will enhance telephony solutions and refine customer engagement strategies.
  
The consultant will also spearhead internal projects, devise Salesforce practice strategies, and formulate roadmaps to advance our service capabilities. With a proven track record, including Salesforce certifications such as Salesforce Service Cloud Consultant, Salesforce Administrator, Salesforce AI Associate and Salesforce Associate, the consultant will showcase extensive knowledge in customizing Salesforce, configuring the platform, managing users, and leveraging additional features to optimize organizational processes. Additional Salesforce certifications are highly regarded. Responsibilities encompass developing and maintaining Salesforce mobile solutions, ensuring data quality and governance, implementing workflow and process automation, and advising Internal stakeholders with well-informed strategies based on Salesforce's Trusted AI Principles. Your designed solutions should be future-proof, seamlessly aligning with the company's long-term growth strategies.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

**Salesforce Administration:** Manage user setup, profiles, roles, permissions, and security settings. Customize Salesforce with custom objects, fields, workflows, and validation rules. Conduct data management activities, monitor system performance, and ensure robust security measures.
  
  

**Service Cloud Solutions:** Design Service Cloud solutions aligned with organizational needs. Implement entitlements, milestones, and SLAs for enhanced customer support. Manage case processing and integrate contact models like bots and telephony systems.
  
  

**Knowledge Management:** Implement Knowledge-Centered Service (KCS) principles for effective knowledge management. Optimize intake and interaction channels to meet business objectives.
  
  

**Reporting and Integration:** Develop insightful reports and dashboards. Integrate Service Cloud with third-party solutions and external data sources. Document test results and communicate findings to internal stakeholders.
  
  

**Sales and Marketing Applications:** Utilize tools for sales process management, opportunity tracking, lead automation, and campaign management.
  
  

**Productivity and Collaboration Tools:** Oversee activities using Chatter, Salesforce Mobile App, and AppExchange applications.
  
  

**Workflow and Process Automation:** Deploy workflows, automation tools, Flow, and approval processes to optimize operational efficiency.
  
  

**Data Management and AI Ethics:** Implement rigorous data governance policies. Ensure data integrity, accuracy, and consistency across platforms. Lead data integration projects and enforce regulatory compliance and ethical AI practices.
  
  

**Consulting and Voice Solutions:** Lead consulting engagements, evaluate deployment strategies, configure Salesforce Service Cloud Voice with Amazon connect setups and troubleshoot Voice system issues.
  
  

**Mobile Solutions:** Design and develop Salesforce Mobile Solutions, customize the Salesforce Mobile App, utilize Lightning App Builder and Lightning Web Components (LWC), and ensure offline synchronization and security compliance.
  
  

**Salesforce Integration:** Design and implement API integrations with external systems, ensuring data consistency and integrity.
  
  

**Salesforce Development:** Engineer customized solutions using Salesforce Lightning components, personalize Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, and Experience Cloud, and develop Lightning Web Components (LWC). Stay updated on Salesforce updates and industry best practices.
  
  

**Platform Configuration:** Configure UI settings, app menus, list views, and global actions. Manage user setups, security controls, and object architecture. Develop comprehensive test plans and strategies for Salesforce projects.
  
  

**User Support and Training:** Provide first-level support for Salesforce-related issues. Facilitate training sessions for end-users and contribute to documentation on Salesforce processes and configurations.
  
**Preferred Qualifications:** Consultant should be graduated and have a proven track record in Salesforce configurations, customizations, integrations, and implementations. Strong experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies and automated testing tools is highly valued. Preferred Salesforce certifications include Salesforce Service Cloud Consultant, Salesforce Administrator, Salesforce AI Associate, and Salesforce Associate. Additional Salesforce certifications are highly regarded. Essential skills include advanced data modelling, problem-solving, and customer engagement abilities. Effective communication and presentation skills are essential, along with the ability to lead technical teams independently. Familiarity with authentication patterns like SAML, SSO, and OAuth is advantageous. Hands-on proficiency in Salesforce Lightning and Service Cloud, including developing custom solutions with Lightning components and Lightning Web Components (LWC), is crucial. Consultant should demonstrate a deep understanding of Salesforce architecture, data model, and best practices, with consulting experience in requirement gathering and solution design.

title: Software Test Engineer
description:
Scania is currently undergoing an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions. IT is a crucial part of this transformation as Scania’s success is depending on flexible and efficient IT solutions that support current and future business requirements.

**Are you our new brilliant and socially adaptable Software Test Engineer?**


Then come and join one of the most exciting teams in tech, our Product Adaption team. You will be part of our agile team that values collaboration and social interaction.

**The team and our responsibilities**  

We are responsible for an in-house solution that manages software updates for almost all Scania products - trucks, buses, industrial and marine engines, used by approximately 1600 workshops around the world. Our application is business critical and there is a lot of focus on quality of the code, useability, security and performance.


You will join a team of 19 competent people in 3 teams with different focus, consisting of Developers, Service Responsible, Test Engineer, Solution Architect and a Manager.

**We value a positive work environment and prioritize having fun while getting things done!**

**What will you do together with the team**  

We need help with the daily test cases and to set up test automation in the team. You will work close with the Test Engineer already working in the team. You will have different applications, at the same time you will cooperate and work together driving the test automation in the team.

**The assignment consist primarily of these parts**  

* Collaborate & Coordinate with the developers after the development and work together if there is any new flow needed to be tested
* Ability to do Functionality Testing & Web application testing
* Able to create automated test scripts for E2E and also for APIs and run those scripts in CI/CD
* Able to do backend testing by using postman & frontend testing
* Report bug findings in Jira and maintain Kanban board
* Drive the test automation process together with the other Test Engineer in the team
**Your experience**  

In order to succeed in this role, you need at least a few years of experience and knowledge of the following:  

* Creating automated test scripts for both API testing and Integration testing
* Functional Testing & Web application testing
* Cloud services, especially in AWS
* Proficiency in test automation frameworks such as Selenium, Cypress, Playwright or Pytest
* Setting up test automation environments and integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines in Gitlab
* Being able to independently plan and execute the test automation efforts
* Creating maintainable documentation such as roadmaps, test strategies and test reports
* It is meritorious if you have experience with Python and JavaScript programming language

You have a degree in IT, Computer Sciences, Engineering, or equivalent experience, and are fluent in English.

**You are a team player** with a proactive, curious and solution oriented mindset. Furthermore you are service minded, hands-on and like to work in an international set-up.  

  

You are focusing on common goals, have an open mindset, strong curiosity to learn new things, find new ways of solving problems and you know how to organize your own work to meet set targets. You appreciate continuous exchange of knowledge and seek constant improvement.

**If you are interested and feel that you have a fair share of what is mentioned above, please apply! If you also have a GitHub/Lab, please send us the link. We would love to hear from you!**

**What We Offer**  

We offer an inspiring workplace, diverse, with great respect for the individual, where you have great opportunities to shape not only your work but also your future. Your personal and professional development is essential and something we encourage and support.  

  

We are flexible with the workplace, with a hybrid approach, you work from home most of the week and we meet on Tuesdays in the office, as it is today. Of course we are flexible in case we need to meet other days at the office.

**What’s in it more for you?**  

* An exciting and challenging international work environment
* The opportunity to develop your technical expertise and further your knowledge
* Colleagues who are eager to share their expertise
* We promote smart working, meaning you can easily combine your working life with your private situation to ensure a healthy work life balance
* A competitive remuneration package

In addition to career and development opportunities and flexibility, we can offer you other benefits such as free training at Scania's own health center Gröndal, or a wellness allowance. You will also be offered performance bonuses, an occupational pension, flexible working hours, the opportunity to lease a car through the company, and much more. Scania also organizes several events throughout the year where family and friends are always welcome. If you live in Stockholm, we also offer a direct bus service between Stockholm and Södertälje with Scania Jobexpress.

**We focus on you as a person, so come as you are. We mean it!**  

  

**For additional information**  

In this recruitment Scania cooperates with **eData Solutions AB**. For questions about the position or the recruitment process, kindly contact Daniel Ruja at daniel@edata.se.

**Time line and process**  

Applicants are advised to apply as soon as possible, but the latest on the **August 18th, 2024**. A background check might be conducted for this position. Please note that a personality test will be conducted as part of this process.


Kindly also note that selection and interviews will be handled on an ongoing bases.


For GDPR reasons, we kindly request that you only send applications through the system, as we do not accept other means.

  


Anställningsform: tillsvidareanställning | Anställningens omfattning: heltid | Antal lediga befattningar: 1 | Sysselsättningsgrad: 100% | Ort: Södertälje | Län: Stockholms län | Land: Sweden | Referensnummer: 2024/2 | Kontakt: Daniel Ruja, | Publicerat: 2024-07-23 | Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-08-18

title: Technical Sales Architect
description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.


Boeing Global Services is seeking a **Technical Sales Architect (m/f/d)** located in Sweden.


The Boeing Digital Aviation Solutions (DAS) Technical Sales Architect must have a broad technical background with experience in modernization and understanding a large portfolio of legacy monolithic applications and how they become distributed, cloud native, software solutions. The candidate needs strong people and technology leadership, analytical skills, teamwork, and excellent communication skills.


The candidate will need to communicate at different levels in the customer and internal organizations, from CXO levels to key business and technical decision makers, to influence our revenue, market-share, and customer satisfaction growth. This role will drive innovative, evolutionary, reliable, scalable solutions discussions that advance Boeing’s thought leadership and trusted-advisor status in the aviation industry.

**Position Responsibilities:**

* This role will work in lockstep with the Sales Directors (SD). Technical Sales Leads (TSL), and other key defined account influencers in the GTM team for successful customer technical and business outcome campaigns.
* Tactical, by customer opportunity, engagement & focus to meet core account deliverables for business outcomes for GTM team and Boeing DAS.
* Be part of a team of Technical Sales Architects who are globally responsible for building and strengthening CIO, CTO, CDO, and CSO relationships within our CA, BA, and GA customer base. This is a player-coach role.
* Partner with the DAS CTO and leaders to understand the business and needs that drive technology decisions.
* Collaborate on a technology roadmap by working closely with CTO and other sales, services, development, and support leaders on positioning the roadmap and competitive positioning with customers and our field Sales Directors, Technical Sales and Services Leaders in our Global DAS Sales team.
* Create, with peers in the GTS TSA team, the messaging and content which aligns with our DAS CTO strategy on modernization of legacy, monolithic applications, and architecting innovative, greenfield applications.
* Effectively discuss and convey strategies, patterns, practices and approaches for modernizing and refactoring legacy applications.
* Effectively discuss and convey applications design which is adaptable, cost-optimized, cloud-native SaaS in a globally distributed, multi-platform environment.
* Leverage your knowledge and experience to help customers make technology decisions that drive innovation and agility while minimizing risks and costs.
* Own the customer CXO discussion for the creation of mechanisms and architectural artifacts that communicate technology adoption, decisions and how DAS applications are hosted, built and deployed.
* Be aware and participate in Architectural Standards and Practices discussions with internal CTO team and customer CXO’s.
* Assist in evaluation of products for being well-architected and well-managed from a customer’s point of view.
* Work closely with internal Information Security Office and Enterprise Cloud teams internally and in our DAS customer base, to ensure security standards and regulatory compliance are discussed. Our coaching and guiding customer CXO/Technical Decision Makers discussions are key to creating and maintaining the trusted advisor status for you and your TSA team.

**This position is hybrid. This means that the selected candidate will be required to perform some work onsite at one of the listed location options. This is at the hiring team’s discretion and could potentially change in the future.**

**Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status.**

**Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):**

* 5+ years of experience in software, application solutions, development and architecture in highly regulated industries.
* 5+ years of experience working with software development design patterns, methodology and life cycle.
* 5+ years of experience/awareness working with legacy technology modernization and refactoring techniques such as domain driven design (DDD), event storming, strangler fig, transitional architectures, etc.
* 5+ years of experience working with distributed, cloud-native, API and Microservices architecture including service orchestration.
* 5+ years of experience/awareness working with application performance management technologies, diagnostics, and issue resolution management.
* 5+ years of experience/awareness in development frameworks, cloud native technologies and tools, such as CI/CD pipelines, UML, Java, .Net, Docker, Kubernetes, JavaScript, Google, AWS, AZURE, and IBM clouds.
* 5+yrs of experience/awareness working with delivering High Availability (HA), resilient solutions that meet regulatory requirements and information security standards.
* 5+ years of proven experience working with customer CIO, CDO, CSO, and key technical decision makers in to influence, advise, compare and recommend technology solutions.
* English skills in writing and speaking.

**Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):**

* Knowledge of the Well-Architected principles.
* Strong interpersonal, communication and organization skills.

**Relocation:** This position does not offer relocation. Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expense.

**Important information regarding this requisition:** This requisition is for a locally hired position in Sweden. Candidates must have current legal authorization to live and work in Sweden. Benefits and pay are determined at the local level and are not part of Boeing U.S. based payroll.


Relocation: This position does not offer relocation. Candidates must live in the immediate area or relocate at their own expense.

 **Equal Opportunity Employer:**


We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not accept unlawful discrimination in our recruitment or employment practices on any grounds including but not limited to; race, color, ethnicity, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, physical or mental disability, genetic factors, military and veteran status, or other characteristics covered by applicable law.


We have teams in more than 65 countries, and each person plays a role in helping us become one of the world’s most innovative, diverse and inclusive companies. We are proud members of the Valuable 500 and welcome applications from candidates with disabilities. Applicants are encouraged to share with our recruitment team any accommodations required during the recruitment process. Accommodations may include but are not limited to: conducting interviews in accessible locations that accommodate mobility needs, encouraging candidates to bring and use any existing assistive technology such as screen readers and offering flexible interview formats such as virtual or phone interviews.
company_description: Boeing is the world's largest aerospace company. We’re engineers & technicians. Innovators & dreamers. Join us, and build something better.

title: Solution Architect
description:
**Om rollen:**
 Vi söker en erfaren Solution Architect som kan bryta ner kravställningar; planera, implementera och stödja utvecklingen av affärscase för kontinuerlig förbättring av tekniska lösningar inom Hardware Asset Management. Du kommer att säkerställa kvalitet och en effektiv leverans genom att aktivt följa etablerade processer – identifiera och föreslå förbättringar som resulterar i snabbare och mer kostnadseffektiv leverans.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter:**
* Omvandla användarbehov till specificerade krav med affärscase.
* Analysera och förstå påverkan av förändringar i anslutna lösningar.
* Definiera tekniska lösningskrav och hantera implementering, samtidigt som du säkerställer att efterlevnads- och säkerhetsstandarder uppfylls.
* Driva aktiviteter för lösnings-, process- och verktygsutveckling bl.a. genom RCA-aktiviteter
* Driva standardisering och automatisering.
* Administration och dokumentation av system.


**Krav:**
* Relevant teknisk utbildning eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Erfarenhet av att omvandla affärsbehov till tekniska krav och lösningar.
* God förståelse för påverkan av tekniska förändringar.
* Erfarenhet av att definiera och implementera tekniska lösningar.
* Stark kunskap om standardisering och automatisering.
* Förmåga att coacha och dela kunskap med kollegor.
* Erfarenhet av systemadministration och dokumentation.
* Erfarenhet av RCA-aktiviteter och förändringsledning.
* Flytande i engelska, både i tal och skrift.


 Meriterande att ha arbetat inom ICT Datacenter
   

  

**Personliga egenskaper:**
 För att trivas och leverera i rollen som Solution Architect är du driven och självgående. Du har ett genuint intresse av att analysera delvis komplexa data och förmåga att omvandla dina analyser till faktiska lösningar. Du ska triggas av utmaningen i ett problem snarare än att nedslås. Likaså ska du ha en naturlig fallenhet för att kommunicera, coacha och främja samarbete. Självklart delar du Transtemas värdegrunder; Ta ansvar, Visa respekt, Tänka nytt.
   

  

 Vi på Transtema tror att mångfald bidrar till en mer dynamisk och kreativ arbetsmiljö som gör att fler trivs på jobbet. Vi hoppas därför att du som söker, med din bakgrund och kompetens, kan bidra till att öka vår mångfald.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Du kommer vara anställd på Transtema Network Services AB, som är ett helägt dotterbolag inom Transtemakoncernen. Transtema Network Services är en marknadsledande leverantör av fälttjänster inom kommunikationsinfrastruktur i Sverige och ansvarar för installation, underhåll samt drift över hela landet.
   

  

 Vi arbetar aktivt med hållbarhet utifrån fyra aspekter - våra medarbetare, vår affär, vår miljö och vårt engagemang.
   

  

 Våra medarbetare är vår största tillgång och vår ambition är att vara branschens mest attraktiva arbetsgivare. Vi har en värderingsstyrd företagskultur och arbetar aktivt med kompetensutveckling, inkludering och att erbjuda en trygg arbetsplats för alla.
   

  

**Övrig information**
 I denna rekrytering kan vi komma att utföra en säkerhetsprövning och registerkontroll.
   

  

**Urval sker löpande, vi ser fram emot din ansökan!**
 Vid frågor om tjänsten, kontakta Miroslav Puskas, telefonnummer XX
   

  

 Vi tar gärna emot samtal från dig som är intresserad av jobbet, men vi tackar vänligt men bestämt nej till dig som säljer annonser och rekryteringstjänster.

title: Senior Säkerhetskonsult till Telia Cygate
description:
Telia Cygate i Region Öst växer och nu söker fler medarbetare som har vilja och engagemang att utvecklas tillsammans med oss.
   

  

 Våra konsulter och tjänster är mycket efterfrågande, och vi utmärker oss bland annat genom att inneha högsta certifieringsnivå (CCSM-E), inom Check Point, Cisco-certifierade konsulter på CCIE-nivå, samt certifierade IT-Arkitekter inom ett brett segment.
   

  

 Jag heter Daniel och leder en grupp av konsulter inom säkerhet på Telia Cygate i Region Öst. Vi utökar nu vårt team med ytterligare spetskompetens inom säkerhetsområdet och behöver ytterligare förstärkning för att tillgodose våra befintliga och blivande kunder.
   

  

**Din nästa utmaning?**
 Som Säkerhetskonsult, kommer du att arbeta nära dina kollegor i implementationsprojekt med installation, design, migrering, konfiguration och felsökning av olika säkerhetslösningar. Vi arbetar med lösningar inom de ledande produkterna inom sitt segment, och hjälper våra kunder med planering, framtidssäkring samt drift och underhåll av deras IT-miljöer.
   

  

 När vi arbetar med kund sträcker sig leveransen ofta över flera tjänsteområden, vilket innebär att du inte enbart kommer arbeta nära ditt eget team, utan även våra andra specialister inom nätverk, säkerhet och Hybrid IT. På så sätt utvecklas du och får bredare kunskaper, som nät- och säkerhetsdrift, Cloud, automation, virtualisering och datacenter. Om du på sikt vill certifiera dig inom ett eller flera områden så är det något vi stödjer och uppmuntrar.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Som person uppvisar du ett genuint intresse för att arbeta med kunder och hjälpa dem med deras tekniska utmaningar.
   

  

 Du älskar att stå framför en grupp av både tekniker och ansvariga inom IT/Teknik och förklara våra lösningar och har lätt för att skapa förtroende och relationer, som i sin tur ger ett sug efter våra produkter, tjänster och erbjudanden.
   

  

 Vi tror att du söker dig till oss för att du vill känna tillhörighet i ett team, framför att arbeta själv. Du har tidigare erfarenhet av hantering av säkerhetslösningar med fokus på produkter/tekniker från produkterna enligt nedan samt deras tilläggsprodukter.
   

  

**Dina erfarenheter:**
* Installation, design, konfiguration och felsökning av:
+ Checkpoint
+ Fortinet
+ InfoBlox
+ DDOS / Radware
+ Bluecoat
+ Zero Touch lösningar
+ Tufin


**Du behöver även ha god erfarenhet av:**
* DHCP, DNS, TCP/IP, 802.1q (VLAN), routingprotokoll
* Du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* Certifieringar ser vi som meriterande


**Home of Experts**
 Telia Cygate har länge varit kända som en IT-partner som har nätverk och säkerhet i sitt DNA. Sedan 2006 är vi en del av Telia Company, vilket ger oss en stabil grund att stå på för att hjälpa våra kunder att utforska möjligheterna med digitalisering och molntjänster på ett tryggt sätt. Men det handlar inte bara om vad vi gör, utan minst lika mycket om hur vi gör det: Med ett leende och alltid med kundens bästa för ögonen. Vi tar med oss kompetens och glädje till alla möten, för vi vet att det är idéerna och mångfalden som bidrar till de mest hållbara lösningarna. Tillsammans gör vi det enkelt och roligt att vara människa i teknikens värld.
   

  

**Intresserad?**
 Sök tjänsten! Vi lovar att du kommer att börja en spännande resa hos oss samtidigt som du har mycket roligt på vägen. Placeringsort är: Stockholm - Solna med omnejd
   

  

 Om du har några frågor gällande den här specifika tjänsten så får du gärna kontakta mig Daniel Westergård på daniel.westergard@cygate.se, alternativt via LinkedIn. Rekryteringen sker löpande, så tveka inte att höra av dig.
   

  

 Bakgrundskontroller ingår i våra rekryteringsprocesser. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Northern Europe Technology Development Lead (R-16409)
description:
**Why We Work at Dun & Bradstreet**
 Dun & Bradstreet unlocks the power of data through analytics, creating a better tomorrow. Each day, we are finding new ways to strengthen our award-winning culture and accelerate creativity, innovation and growth. Our 6,500+ global team members are passionate about what we do. We are dedicated to helping clients turn uncertainty into confidence, risk into opportunity and potential into prosperity. Bold and diverse thinkers are always welcome. Come join us! Learn more at dnb.com/careers .
   

  

**About The Role**
 The Northern Europe Technology Development Lead will be responsible for the strategy, ownership and delivery for a number of our key Local Markets (Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Estonia and Latvia). This role is the pivotal partner for our business units in the segment on those markets, understanding the Business initiatives, potential opportunities and Technology requirements and owning the delivery from Technology to meet those Business Objectives.
   

  

 In addition to delivering for our business units, this role will be responsible for the modernization of the local markets within Northern Europe. Understanding the Technology platforms and organizational structure and defining the strategies for modernizing those platforms and bringing them together. D&B is growing rapidly within the Northern Europe markets and as a result we are looking for a Leader who can continue to drive and evolve our platforms to keep pace with this growth.
   

  

 Owning the strategy, approach and outcomes for these markets will be challenging as each local market has its own Business Deliverables, challenges and platforms to modernize. This will require a comprehensive mix of Technology skills, primarily as a leader you will need to define and drive the North Star for the Northern Europe markets. This will require heavy strategic thinking and direction, coupled with the fact that there is a large and complex delivery book of work. This role will be owning all of this and tracking/driving these markets and the programmes within them, so programme management and governance is imperative. Understanding and managing the cost base for the area will require good budget management capabilities, with the incumbent responsible for the budget, delivery within it and driving innovation to deliver more efficiently.
   

  

 Our platforms underpin some of the more complex businesses in Northern Europe and so require good knowledge of cloud-based technologies, microservices and high availability platforms. Finally excellent communication and stakeholder skills are required as the incumbent will be expected to provide domain management and updates to the full Northern Europe team.
   

  

 This role is fundamental for D&B International. Reporting into Senior Director Local Markets Europe and working close to the Senior Director Technology Development Strategic Products Europe you will be responsible for one of our largest and most complex markets, and to ensure that they continue to be successful whilst managing the modernization of Technology with zero impact to each market.
   

  

 This role will ensure that D&B can meet the needs of our ever-growing set of clients, products and data so it is a vital portion of our Technology transformation.
   

  

 Delivering on those technical commitments to meet our commercial objectives and responsible for keeping the European Leadership Team and other stakeholders updated on progress.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Overall E2E ownership for the Technology Functions within the Northern Europe Markets.
* Stakeholder management for the Northern Europe markets, representing Technology in the Northern Europe Leadership team and representing the markets for Technology.
* Working in partnership with the Local Market Leads, define, track and manage these projects to ensure delivery to budget and committed timelines.
* Develop the strategy and process for modernizing the Northern Europe markets, including product, resourcing and back office.
* Develop the vendor and location strategies for the domain, looking to utilize Technology centers in addition to the local market resource.
* Ensuring SLAs, metrics and continuous improvement measures are in place and can be demonstrated.
* Manage a significant domain budget, understanding, challenging, and proactively managing their cost and time position to mitigate potential delays and identify efficiencies.
* Identify any dependencies, risks and issues and ensure mitigation plans in place.
* Work closely with regional representatives from multiple global teams to ensure an effective cross-functional approach.
* Act as pivotal connection between the Technology delivery team and the commercial business to ensure requirements and timelines are understood and aligned.
* Coach, develop and challenge project teams (direct reports or otherwise) to a successful implementation.
* Effectively communicate timely and relevant updates to multiple stakeholder groups including International Technology and the European Leadership Team


**Key Attributes**
* Proven track record of leading a major Technology programme across multiple countries as a senior project director or lead preferably within a large organization.
* Strong project management and organizational skills with experience of managing complex projects and performance management of suppliers.
* Strong Technology background – knowledge of agile delivery practices, large scale data platforms and Java
* Ability to define and implement KPI’s around quality, efficiency and delivery for large distributed scrum teams.
* Exceptional multi-tasker, strategic and tactical thinker
* Ability to prioritize and adapt while maintaining the highest attention to detail.
* Able to shape, lead and control the delivery of complex, cross-functional projects, including optimization of resources and delivery to challenging timescales.
* Relationship management, able to build and maintain effective working relationships and work collaboratively with a wide range of colleagues.
* Understanding of relevant data legislation and privacy compliance across Europe


**Skills**
* 10+ years of experience of Leadership experience relating to critical Domains or Programmes.
* Extensive project management skills with a focus on business-centric projects
* Ability to develop governance methodologies as an integral part of successful program execution.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with a diverse group of leaders, managers, and subject matter experts.
* Able to successfully engage in multiple initiatives simultaneously.
* Demonstrable skills in presenting information effectively and delivering effective reporting mechanisms.
* Able to produce high quality, effective and thorough documentation.
* Able to manage and prioritize competing requirements.
* Fluent in Swedish and English language


 All Dun & Bradstreet job postings can be found at https://www.dnb.com/about-us/careers-and-people/joblistings.html and https://jobs.lever.co/dnb . Official communication from Dun & Bradstreet will come from an email address ending in @dnb.com.
   

  

 Notice to Applicants: Please be advised that this job posting page is hosted and powered by Lever. Your use of this page is subject to Lever's Privacy Notice and Cookie Policy , which governs the processing of visitor data on this platform.

title: IT Application Specialist till Linde Gas
description:
Linde Gas söker en stark problemlösare med passion för teknik som vill fortsätta utvecklas i rollen som Applikationsspecialist. Här en del av ett starkt team med hög kompetens och engagemang. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
 



  

**Företag :**
 Linde Gas
 



  

**Plats :**
 Solna, Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 IT
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Rekrytering
 



  

**Övrigt :**
 Möjlighet till distansarbete
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som Applikationsspecialist på Linde Gas kommer du att ansvara för två plattformar, Accura och Linx. Accura är en egenutvecklad applikation som används av Lindes kunder, såsom sjukhus, för att hantera lager och beställningar. Linx är en handdatorapplikation för Lindes återförsäljare i syfte att hålla koll på lagerhållning. Du kommer att arbeta nära applikationsägare och externa partners för att underhålla och förbättra dessa system, samt säkerställa att de fungerar optimalt.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Möjligheten att arbeta på ett globalt företag med stora utvecklingsmöjligheter
  
* Stöd och utbildning för att utveckla din tekniska kompetens
  
* En dynamisk arbetsmiljö med engagerade och kunniga kollegor
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Utföra underhåll, uppdatering och utveckling på plattformarna
  
* Ge kvalificerad systemteknisk support i samarbete med applikationsögare
  
* Arbeta direkt med applikationsägare för att förstå och hjälpa till att definiera nya applikationskrav
  
* Säkerställa lämplig kunskapsöverföring för applikationer som utvecklats med externa partners för att möjliggöra internt stöd
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Har en relevant utbildningsbakgrund, troligtvis inom IT
  
* Har erfarenhet av applikationsutveckling, och gärna SAP-relaterad
  
* Grundläggande kunskaper i Java och Azure
  
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
  
* Har en bred teknisk bakgrund
  
* Har erfarenhet av att hantera leverantörer
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Målmedveten
  
* Ordningsam
  
* Stabil
  
* Ansvarstagande
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Linde Gas**

 Linde är ett ledande globalt företag inom industrigaser och teknik. Linde lever efter sin mission att göra vår värld mer produktiv varje dag genom att tillhandahålla högkvalitativa lösningar, teknologier och tjänster som gör deras kunder mer framgångsrika och hjälper till att upprätthålla, avkarbonisera och skydda vår planet.
 


  


 Lindes industrigaser och teknologier används i otaliga applikationer, inklusive produktion av ren väte som är kritisk för energiomställningen, livräddande medicinsk syrgas och högrenade specialgaser för elektronik, bland annat. I över 50 år har Linde varit en global ledare inom väte och utnyttjar sin ingenjörskompetens, tillsammans med en betydande tillgångsbas och expertis, för att göra renare energi till verklighet världen över.
   




**Bli direktrekryterad till Linde Gas**

 Detta är en direktrekrytering, vilket betyder att den kandidat som får tjänsten blir direktanställd av kundföretaget. Rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av Academic Work.
   




**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Mikaela Hofstedt eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stv3@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15105985

title: Projektledare Infrastruktur
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
  

**På AECOM levererar vi en bättre värld.**
  

 Vi på AECOM anser att en god infrastruktur skapar möjligheter för alla. Oavsett om det handlar om att förbättra din pendling, hålla ljuset på, ge tillgång till rent vatten eller att förbättra arkitektur så bidrar vårt arbete till att skapa bättre förutsättningar för samhällen och människor.
   

  

 Våra kunder litar på att vi använder de mest lämpade teamen, idéerna och tekniska kompetensen i vårt arbete inom transport, byggnader, vatten, miljö och förnybar energi. Vi är ett globalt etablerat företag - ca 50 000 anställda världen över - som drivs av ett gemensamt syfte och engagemang att leverera en bättre värld.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
  

 AECOM söker för närvarande en
 **Projektledare till vårt transportteam.**
  

 I din roll som projektledare kommer du bland annat att ansvara för och leda arbetet med att utveckla processen för leveranser inom projektet samt den övergripande hanteringen av delleveranser som successivt kommer att färdigställas i projektet. De kommer också att innefatta mer traditionella projektledningsuppgifter som: tidsplanering, kostnadsuppföljning, kvalitet, riskarbete, krishantering, osv.
   

  

 Du kommer att få möjlighet att arbeta med några av de mest intressanta infrastrukturprojekten i Sverige.
   

  

 Tjänsten passar dig som kan arbeta med en god grad av självständighet från dag till dag med uppgifter som omfattar skrivbordsstudier/genomförbarhetsstudier, markundersökningar och tolkningar till slutlig projektering.
   

  

 När du ansluter dig till oss kommer du att få kontakt och samarbeta med ett globalt nätverk av experter - planerare, projekterare, ingenjörer, forskare, konsulter, program- och byggledare - som leder förändringen mot en mer hållbar och rättvis framtid.
   

  

 På Stockholmskontoret kommer du att ingå i ett dynamiskt och växande team där du kan kombinera fördelarna med ett litet kontor på ett stort företag: självständighet, flexibilitet, global expertis och stabilitet.
   

  

 Här får du friheten att växa i en värld av möjligheter. Vi ger dig den flexibilitet du behöver för att prestera med hybridarbetsalternativ. Oavsett om du arbetar från kontoret, på distans i Sverige eller ute hos en kund kommer du att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där din integritet, entreprenörsanda och ditt banbrytande tankesätt förespråkas.
   

  

 Viktiga arbetsuppgifter är bland annat:
   

* Representant för AECOM:s projektteam gentemot kunden.
* Ansvara för att arbetspaket levereras i tid.
* Samordning av AECOM:s tekniska chefer/samordnare (Sverige, Spanien, Storbritannien och andra platser).
* Identifiera och kommunicera övergripande kundkrav till AECOM:s konstruktionsteam och övervaka genomförandet av kraven.
* Samordna och vara värd för möten om kundprojektering
* Samordna tvärvetenskaplig verksamhet, såsom seminarier och gränssnittskontroller.
* Ansvara för uppföljning och rapportering av projektresultat.
* Hantera och kommunicera projektändringar.
* Kundförhandlingar om ändringar i omfattning och budget.
* Övervaka att kvalitetsförfaranden följs och dokumenteras inom respektive tekniska discipliner.
* Stöd till BD/Group Manager för marknadssektorn i samband med anbud.
  


**Kvalifikationer**
  

 Minimikrav
   

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av projektledning av infrastrukturprojekt (vägar, järnvägar, försörjningsföretag).
* Utmärkt muntlig och skriftlig förmåga att kommunicera på både svenska och engelska.
* Driven och självständig.
  


 Kvalifikationer/erfarenhet:
   

* Multidisciplinär projekt- och konstruktionsledning.
* Erfarenhet av utveckling av detaljerad utformning och upphandlingsdokumentation (anbudskontrakt) för prestationsbaserade kontrakt och/eller kontrakt för konstruktion och byggande (AB04/ABT06).
* Erfarenhet av övervakning/uppföljning av byggarbetsplatser.
* Utbildning/erfarenhet i projektledning.
  


 Meriterande kvalifikationer:
   

* Kandidatexamen eller magisterexamen i civilingenjörsutbildning, PM/CM eller motsvarande.
  


 \
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
  

**Här får du friheten att växa i en värld av möjligheter.**
  

 Vi ger dig den flexibilitet du behöver för att kunna prestera med hybridarbetsalternativ. Oavsett om du arbetar från kontoret, på distans i Sverige eller ute hos en kund kommer du att arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där din integritet, entreprenörsanda och ditt banbrytande tankesätt förespråkas.
   

  

 Du kommer att hjälpa oss att främja en kultur av jämlikhet, mångfald och inkludering - en säker och respektfull arbetsplats där vi bjuder in alla att ta med sig hela sitt jag till jobbet och använda sina unika talanger, bakgrunder och sin expertis för att skapa förändrande resultat för våra kunder.
   

  

 Vi uppmuntrar dig att växa och utveckla din karriär hos oss genom våra tekniska och professionella utvecklingsprogram och mångsidiga karriärmöjligheter. Vi tror på ledarskap på alla nivåer. Oavsett var du befinner dig i organisationen kan du göra en bestående inverkan på de projekt du arbetar med, de team och kommittéer du går med i och vår verksamhet i helhet.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftiga löner och förmåner, välbefinnandeprogram för att stödja dig och din familj och de utvecklingsresurser du behöver för att avancera i din karriär.
   

  

 När du ansluter dig till oss kommer du att få kontakt och samarbeta med ett globalt nätverk av experter - planerare, projekterare, ingenjörer, forskare, konsulter, program- och byggledare - som leder förändringen mot en mer hållbar och rättvis framtid. Gå med oss och låt oss komma i gång.
   

  

**ReqID:** 
 J10107945
   

  

**Business Line:** 
 Transportation
   

  

**Business Group:** 
 DCS
   

  

**Strategic Business Unit:** 
 Europe & India
   

  

**Career Area:** 
 Program & Project Management
   

  

**Work Location Model:** 
 Hybrid
   

  

**Legal Entity:** 
 AECOM NORDIC AB

title: Key Account Manager - Public Sector
description:
**Join us in shaping a sustainable world free from plastic pollution**
 At PlasticFri our vision is a sustainable world free from plastic pollution. Plastics are made from petroleum and stay in the environment for thousands of years! By 2050, the oceans could have more plastic than fish. At PlasticFri, we are on a mission to change that.
   

  

 🏆 PlasticFri has been awarded as the “World’s Most Innovative Sustainability Startup” among 1400 companies Worldwide!
   

  

 🥇 We were also recently received the prestigious “Global Tech Innovator" award among 2000 technology companies worldwide.
   

  

 We are now scaling our team in order to continue our mission of creating a world free from plastic pollution, where circularity has been enabled.
   

  

**Key Account Manager Public Sector**
 As Key Account Manager (KAM) you have the responsibility for managing public sector relationships with the objective of maximizing business opportunities and revenue growth. This includes identifying, planning and executing activities that will generate upsales, cross sales and new product adoption. You will report to the Sales Manager.
   

  

**Your Main Responsibilities Will Be To**
* Manage existing key customers and develop and nurture relationships, anticipate and understand their needs, challenges and objectives
* Create new business in the municipal and public sector, account plans with objectives, strategies and tactics to achieve sales targets
* Identify opportunities for upselling, cross-selling, and new product adoption.
* Negotiate terms, contracts, and agreements, ensuring they align with both the client's needs and the company's objectives.
* Act as a primary point of contact for issue resolution, working closely with relevant teams to address client concerns promptly.
* Prepare regular reports on key account performance, revenue forecasts, and other relevant metrics
* Stay up to date with industry trends, adopt new technologies and foster a culture of innovation within the team to stay competitive
* Collaborate closely with other functions to ensure alignment and synergy between sales and the overall business strategy


**Ideal Candidate**
 In order to succeed in the role, we believe that you have:
   

  

* At least 5+ years of experience in sales within the public sector
* Experience of working with tenders (upphandlingar) in the municipal or public sector with a strong network
* Proven experience from managing the whole sales cycle with a strong sales toolkit: you can identify, segment, prospect, qualify, negotiate and close deals
* Good knowledge with the public procurement laws such as (offentlig upphandling, innovationsupphandling & förstudie)
* Excellent people skills, enjoying building and managing relationships with current and potential customers
* Excellent sales, presentation, negotiation and communication skills
* Great time management and organizational skills
* Fluent speaking and writing skills in both Swedish and English


**We Also See That You**
* Are very result-oriented with a determination to deliver on high goals
* Are passionate about impact and sustainability
* Thrive in a fast-paced environment, being a doer and learning on the way
* Are proactive and independent and take own initiatives and execute and deliver on them in order to achieve great results
* Possess self leadership, being accountable for your responsibilities and managing your work and time and development
* Have a willingness to travel for work if needed
* Have a network in the public and municipal sector

title: CRM Architects and Senior Consultants
description:
Job Title: Senior Dynamics 365 CE Consultant / Architect
   

  

 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 About Us: My client is a leading provider of innovative technology solutions, specialising in Microsoft Dynamics 365 implementations. We are committed to delivering exceptional services to our clients, helping them transform their businesses and achieve their goals.
   

  

 Position Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Dynamics 365 CE Consultant to join our dynamic team in Stockholm. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience working with Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement (CE) and possess a deep understanding of CRM processes and best practices. This is an exciting opportunity to work on greenfield projects and make a significant impact on our clients' success.
   

  

 Responsibilities:
   

  

* Lead the implementation and configuration of Dynamics 365 CE solutions for our clients.
* Gather and analys business requirements, design solution architectures, and provide expert guidance throughout the project lifecycle.
* Customise and extend Dynamics 365 CE using tools such as Power Apps, Power Automate, and JavaScript.
* Provide technical expertise and support to junior consultants and project teams.
* Collaborate with clients to understand their business objectives and ensure successful project delivery.
* Stay up-to-date with the latest Microsoft technologies and industry trends.


 Requirements:
   

  

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* 5+ years of experience working with Dynamics 365 CE, including implementation, configuration, and customisation.
* Proficiency in Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Power Automate) and Azure services.
* Strong understanding of CRM processes and best practices.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with clients and internal teams.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.
* Microsoft certifications (e.g., Dynamics 365 CE, Power Platform) are a plus.


 Benefits:
   

  

* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects with leading clients.
* Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
* Dynamic and collaborative work environment.


 If you are a motivated and experienced Dynamics 365 CE Consultant looking for a new challenge, we would love to hear from you!
